name: Siege (WhiskerGaming)
description:
Your castle is under attack! Use your cannons to repel the invading force! Don't let them get too close to your castle!

Part of the Kex x Pusia mini jam

Press Space to control everything:

  • Pick a bullet type
  • Aim
  • Pick your angle
  • Fire!

Music:

"Crusade - Heavy Industry" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
